reviews.review_msg: Doyon has good lectures and the course is really interesting. However, the grading criteria for the papers were pretty vague and unclear. This is especially an issue because your mark is based on 4 papers (and canvas discussions). As a result, it is not easy to get a good mark on the papers unless you reach out and clarify the criteria with Doyon.
Prof Doyon was tough but I really enjoyed her content. I learnt a heck of a lot and would 100% recommend her as a prof. Biggest tip is to email her if you have any questions.

Professor Doyon did a good job adapting to the online format. The lecture videos were well done. She has very high standards and you will likely be marked a lot harder than you're used to. This aspect of the course was quite frustrating. Having said this, I appreciated the extensive feedback we received on our assignments.

Bummed out cuz the class sounded so interesting and I had high hopes, but the prof marks way too hard with unclear guidelines so this class was not as fun as I thought it would be. Has very high expectations even though she doesn't provide detailed criteria. Super bummed out.

Extremely difficult to know what she wants from you in order to receive marks. Overall, a nice person, but a terrible prof that has personal biases in all aspects of her teaching. The lecture recordings are incredibly hard to follow at times so it's best to just read the assigned material. If you can avoid her, do yourself a favour and do so.
